channel.title: Need Help Now!
channel.description: Hi everyone! I have a weird problem. When i use a client and i click 2 times it close automatic. Only the moparscape client works.. How can i fix it ?? Hope u know Thanks !

item.title: Need Help Now!
item.dc:creator: @Masterthom Masterthom
item.description:
@Masterthom wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:8, topic:307590”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=403742.msg2989207#msg2989207 date=1255201031]
MY CAPS LOCK IS BROKEN I SUPPOSE :mad:
[/quote]
No need to throw a hissy over it. :\

[quote author=Masterthom link=topic=403742.msg2989209#msg2989209 date=1255201062]

[quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=403742.msg2989204#msg2989204 date=1255200862]

Your client must be faulty.
[/quote]OBVIOUSLY NOW HE JUST NEEDS HELP
[/quote]Norly… Nice Caps Lock? :s

Your client must be faulty. Does it happen with all clients (nonwebclient)?

Yeah and i mean the nonwebclients like deltascape client

ALL Clients? I’ve never used Deltascape before, so I wouldn’t know.

[Still belongs in Client Help.]

Yeah thanks for your time but i cant do anything with this …

I guess use webclients? :\ Never dealt with this problem.[/quote]
Yeah but they even doesn’t work :S only moparscape client work…

Read full topic
